description: BinHex was an encoding system and app available for Classic Mac OS. It allowed users to convert binary files into hexadecimal or plain text files, from which the original binary file could be reconstructed.
Most often, the hexadecimal or plain text files that BinHex created were saved with the .HQX , .HEX , or .hcx extensions. However, some BinHex files were saved as BHX files.
